resources.string: Search for stores, events and parking spaces with live data and move through the city with interactive 360Â° panoramas! Find the cheapest gas station or get reminders for garbage can emptying dates.
For more information about the terms and conditions and privacy policy, please see here.
By continuing, you agree to the terms and conditions and acknowledge the privacy policy.
This app would not be possible without open data.
The app is based on what is known as \"open data\", which is provided by various institutions. They can be used for commercial and non-commercial purposes by anybody.
You can find more information about this subject in the app.
Now, select if you are a citizen or a visitor, so that the app can be adjusted to your needs.
View the price of fuel in your area.
Easily locate free parking lots near you.
The waste schedule informs you about the next pick-up dates.
Get information about arrival and departure times of buses and trains.
These features are enabled based on your selection. You can adjust the settings at any time.
Your device has a gps capabilities
The app can conscientiously use your current location to find places, affordable fuel stations or parking lots near you.
Transparency comes first, so you\'ll find a detailed list of how and what location information is used for.
The app works well regardless of your location permission. It\' s entirely up to you.
Get the next fuel prices in your area at a glance.
Find your street quickly when setting up.
You have now completed the setup.\nNow you can explore the app.
